title: Red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting
ingredients: ['60g butter, softened', '150g golden caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '120ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g plain flour, sifted', '10g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon red food colouring', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoon apple cider vinegar', 'For the frosting', '50g unsalted butter, softened', '300g icing sugar', '125g cream cheese, at room temperature', 'red sprinkles, to finish']
